articles.title: Roy Lichtenstein (1923)
articles.description: Lichtenstein was an American artist best known for his brilliantly colored paintings in the style of large-scale comic strips, such as Whaam! and Drowning Girl. Originally an abstract expressionist, he turned to the New York-based pop art movement in the 1960…

articles.title: Full list of those given gongs in New Year Honours list
articles.description: The full list of recipients in the New Year Honours list - including Melvyn Bragg (pictured) - has been released. It features 1,123 people who have served Britain - with 49 per cent of them women.
